restaurant.name: Bella Vista Bistro
restaurant.description: A cozy Italian bistro serving authentic dishes made with fresh, locally-sourced ingredients in a warm, welcoming atmosphere.
restaurant.welcomeMessage: Welcome to Bella Vista Bistro! I'm your AI assistant, ready to help you explore our delicious Italian menu and place your order. What can I get started for you today?

faqs.question: Do you allow pets?
faqs.answer: Yes, we welcome well-behaved dogs on our outdoor patio only.

faqs.question: Do you offer gluten-free options?
faqs.answer: Yes, we have gluten-free pasta and pizza options available. Please let us know about any allergies.

faqs.question: What are your hours?
faqs.answer: We're open Monday through Sunday from 11 AM to 10 PM.

faqs.question: Do you take reservations?
faqs.answer: Yes, we accept reservations for parties of 4 or more. Please call us at (555) 123-4567.
